Rules.InvariantScript: LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Text Medium Font Size").'Default Value'
ColorValue( LookUp('Environment Variable Definitions', 'Display Name'="Common Primary Background").'Default Value')//_VarGblAppColors.PrimaryBg

/*
If(IsBlank(LookUp('SKU Images', SKU.'Product SKU' = ThisItem.'Product SKU').'Image Link'), SampleImage, LookUp('SKU Images', SKU.'Product SKU' = ThisItem.'Product SKU').'Image Link')
*/
ThisItem.'Primary Image'
LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Text Medium Font Size").'Default Value'

ThisItem.Product.'Product Name' & " (" & LookUp(
    OfflineVariantCollection,
    Variants = LookUp(
        OfflineProductVariantCollection,
        'Product Variants' = ThisItem.'Product Variant'.'Product Variants'
    ).Variant.Variants
).'Variant Name' & ")"
LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Text Medium Font Size").'Default Value'
LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Text Medium Font Size").'Default Value'
LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Text Medium Font Size").'Default Value'
LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Text Medium Font Size").'Default Value'
LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Text Medium Font Size").'Default Value'

If(
    newProductList.OrderType = "Primary",
    LookUp(
        PrimaryCart,
        productGUID = ThisItem.Product.Product
    ).quantity,
    newProductList.OrderType = "Secondary",
    LookUp(
        SecondaryCart,
        productGUID = ThisItem.Product.Product
    ).quantity
)
LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Text Medium Font Size").'Default Value'

If(IsBlank(LookUp(
    OfflineProductPriceCollection,
    'Product SKU'.'Product SKU' = ThisItem.'Product SKU' && 'Price list'.Name = varPricelist.Name
).'Ex-Factory'), DisplayMode.Disabled, DisplayMode.Edit)

If(
    varSelectedTabId = 1,
    OfflineProductSKUCollection,
    varSelectedTabId = 2,
    OfflineProductSKUCollection,
    varSelectedTabId = 3,
    Filter(
        OfflineProductSKUCollection,
        Promoted = 'Promoted (Product SKUS)'.Yes
    )
)
